description: Kuhl's legendary Burr™ series just got better! The same rugged, 100% combed cotton exterior now combines with quilted insulation for our warmest Burr yet. Stylish berber accents add comfort and warmth while our articulated design provides freedom of motion with a superior fit. This season, experience the all-new Burr Insulated men’s jacket because the adventures don’t stop when the temperatures drop.
name: Kuhl Burr Insulated - Mens
